Featured-image: 8908-navy-sleeveless-beaded-top-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Gorgeous floor length gown with a mock sweetheart neckline and sheer overlay. Intricate beadwork accents the bodice and the high neck. The checked pattern across the sheer back adds a hint of architecture to this amazingly gentle appearing gown.
